tw-toolkit.dialog.title: Resize Token
tw-toolkit.dialog.label: Size:
tw-toolkit.button.title: Resize Token
tw-toolkit.settings.enableResizeToken.hi: Enable or disable the resize token feature.
tw-toolkit.settings.allowResizeTokenForP: If disabled, only the GM can resize tokens.
tw-toolkit.settings.enableUrlToImage.hin: Allow URLs sent in chat to be converted into images.
tw-toolkit.settings.allowUrlImageForPlay: Allow Players to Use URL to Image
If disabled, only the GM can paste image URLs in chat.
tw-toolkit.urlToImage.invalidUrl: The URL does not appear to be a valid image: {url}
